mapper.select: select member_id, name, email, tel from lms_member order by name asc
select member_id, name, email, cdt, tel, photo from lms_member where member_id = #{value}
select member_id, name, email, tel from lms_member where name like concat('%', #{value}, '%') or email like concat('%', #{value}, '%') or tel like concat('%', #{value}, '%') order by name asc
mapper.insert: insert into lms_member( name, email, pwd, tel, photo) values( #{name}, #{email}, password(#{password}), #{tel}, #{photo})
